divs: Sighting Detailsi was looking at the ufo from my bedroom i wes going to the wc when i saw the ufo it was on next door griss the ufo was not vrey big black all over it had red light cameing from inside i was going to take a photo of it as i was geting to take the photo of it the ufo fly straight up the women that live in the flat whay the ufo got very ill and die i was with my mum and dad at the hospital in epping the dr say to my mum he did not know why the woman die my mum know the women all the vegetation all die thank you for your time
